title: Bloomberg Markets: Jeh Johnson on Democracy vs. Technology
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Jeh Johnson on Democracy vs. Technology
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Jeh Johnson\u0010Former U.S. Homeland Security Secretary \u0010Discussing measures the government and businesses must take to thwart sophisticated cyber attacks.
